attributes.action: END THE PRIVATE CONSUMPTION OF CATS AND DOGS IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details:
To eliminate the possibility of any future exploitation taking place, we urgently need to close this loophole and further demonstrate that the UK does not support this practice taking place within its borders. 

As a result, we are calling on the Ministry of Justice to impose an outright ban of the private slaughter and consumption of both cats and dogs throughout the UK.
attributes.background: The UK claims to be a nation of animal lovers, yet there is a major loophole in our legal system which supports the private slaughter and consumption of both cats and dogs in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:
'Make the private slaughter and consumption of cats and dogs illegal'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615095
